page.title: 12Barnage Farm
page.content: On Barnage Farm they have 40 geese, 12 chickens,24 ducklings and 7 peacocks. The chickens don't lay very many free range eggs.Mrs.Martyn keeps them and fattens them up for the{butcher at {Christmas.}They also have 60 young cattle,10 beef cattle and 500 sheep.When they have sheared the sheep they are left with {1800kg of wool {altogether},or three and a half kg per sheep.They have three tractors for two farmers.They have 30 acres of corn fields,5 acres of potatoes and 20 acres of swedes.They own 220 acres.They get about {5,000 bales of {hay }a year.Mr.Martyn employs {4 full {time workers.}Mrs.Martyn is very interested in our Domesday project.
